content: introducing the penguin pals c2c blanket crochet pattern a charming addition to your winter crochet collection designed using the corner-to-corner c2c color work method this pattern features two adorable penguins all ready for winter fun framed with a simple knit-like border edge this cozy throw is perfect for snuggling or as a delightful holiday gift ideal for all skill levels the pattern includes clear instructions to create a playful winter penguin blanket includes written row-by-row instructions for easy following the ad-free pdf features a full-color graph and row-by-row color block chart for precise stitching finished size in mini-half_double_crochet is 29 1/2 x 42 with the option to enlarge using standard double_crochet c2c stitch comes with border instructions for a simple edging with a knit-like texture
